nodes.text: A Nihilus slave was one of the men that operated systems control on the bridge of Darth Nihilus's flagship, the Ravager. Meetra Surik, a former Jedi Knight, Visas Marr, Nihilus's former apprentice, and Canderous Ordo, the current Mandalore; encountered these individuals when she confronted Nihilus during the Battle of Telos IV. They gave her a vacant stare, and had the appearance of being half-dead.
